name: Diversify Research
text: Own 3 technologies other than your starting technologies.

name: Bestow a Keleres Fleet
text: Remove 1 of your carriers, 1 of your cruisers and 1 of your destroyers from the game board.

name: Master the Sciences
text: Own 6 technologies other than your starting technologies.

name: Establish Imperial Navy
text: Remove 2 of your carriers, 2 of your cruisers and 2 of your destroyers from the game board.
